interpolated: FR: A text where I interpolate {count} times
number: FR: My favorite number is {n, number}
pluralized: FR: I have {count, plural,=1 {one cat} other {{count} cats}}
pluralized-with-hash: FR: I have {count, plural, one {just # cat} other {# cats}}
selected: FR: {gender, select, male {He is a good boy} female {She is a good girl} other {They are good fellas}}
